Formula 1 Blog: See .txt File

All my torrents for F1 2013 are wrapped into MKV format. Resolution is scaled to 720p with 6 channel AC3 Dolby Digital Audio (When available)

These video files will play very fluidly with the standard media players such as VLC, WMP, KM Player, WMC, MP-HC.


I welcome any comments or suggestions...


FOR ALL YOUR LATEST F1 NEWS, GOSSIP, TRACK GUIDES, DISCUSSION & FULL TORRENT & FILESHARE LINKS INFORMATION IN MORE DETAIL, AND ACCESS TO MUCH 

MORE, PLEASE KEEP YOUR EYE ON MY BLOG
